name: dts-generator
description: .d.ts generator. Generates a single d.ts bundle containing external modules from TypeScript files.

scripts.install: node -e "require('child_process').exec(require.resolve('typescript/bin/tsc') + ' -m commonjs -t es5 bin/dts-generator.ts index.ts', function(error, stdout, stderr){stdout&&process.stdout.write(stdout);stderr&&process.stderr.write(stderr);if(error)process.exit(1);})"
